moa.tasks
Interface TaskMonitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
NullMonitor, StandardTaskMonitor
public interface TaskMonitor

Interface representing a task monitor.

Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
